page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF FIONA
page.content: I get up at 7.30 in the morning and go downstairs to have breakfast. I have 2.5 Weetabix in a bowl with some milk.When I have finished that I have 4 pieces of buttered toast and a cup of tea.Then I go and put on my clothes. I wear a blue and white gingham dress. Then I wash my face and clean my teeth in the bathroom. I say goodbye to Mum and walk off up the road to school. It takes 3 minutes.When I get there I rush to meet Georgina and Clare. We play games like Sticking Glue. The teacher blows the whistle at 9.00.We quickly get in lines and see our teacher standing there. She says go in class 6 and 28 children walk into school.Class 5 off you go.Nicky come out at the front and stop talking, you can write out 50 lines at dinner time.Class 4 go in,3,2,and class 1. By Fiona aged 9.
